ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ranch salad dressing, or to taste
½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese, or to taste
2 (12.5 fl oz) cans chicken chunks, drained

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese at room temperature for easier mixing
Drain canned chicken thoroughly to prevent watery dip
Stir occasionally while baking to ensure even heating
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through making a quick buffalo chicken dip using canned chicken that has great flavor and perfect consistency.
